node.detail_zh: 患者 6 月 30 日因長期病患入住伊利莎伯醫院 A6 內科病房，期間出現有痰及呼吸困難症狀。與第 #1513、#1563 及 #1602 宗個案患者曾處於同一病格。隔離期間曾有數次陰性病毒檢測結果，7 月 17 日鼻咽拭子檢測結果為陽性。
node.detail_en: The patient was admitted to medical ward A6, Queen Elizabeth Hospital upon underlying health conditions, having then developed sputum and breathing difficulty. She was in the same ward with patients #1513, #1563, and #1602 and tested negative for the virus for several times. Her nasal swap tested positive on July 17.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Lai Sum House, Lai Tsui Court
